mapper.select: SELECT t.tidx ,t.midx ,t.title ,t.content ,t.wdate ,t.cnt ,t.delyn ,j.people_cnt FROM team t JOIN (SELECT COUNT(jidx) as people_cnt, tidx FROM jointable WHERE joinyn = 'Y' GROUP BY tidx) j ON t.tidx = j.tidx;
SELECT COUNT(t.tidx) FROM team t, usertable u WHERE t.midx = u.midx AND t.delyn = 'N' ORDER BY t.tidx DESC
